name: Wanted Zombie
description:
a funny game you can play it in your free time and enjoy on your PC.There are some puzzles in this game try to find it and tell me.

control:

-wasd to move-E to buy ammo and health-Space Bar to jump-RMB to shot-UP Arow&DOWN Arow to move in the menu-F4 to exit the game.

this is just the beta vesion and there are full version coming soon.
